meta.description: Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse at Washington Dulles International Airport (IAD), Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse

location.terminalDirections: Located between Concourses A and B, in front of Gate A32 and the main Duty Free Store.

lounge.description: Relaxed, friendly, luxurious - the Washington Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse offers the ultimate airport experience. Retreat for some precious 'me time' before your flight. As you might have noticed, Virgin Atlantic likes to stand out from the crowd, and you'll feel right at home in these gracefully sleek surroundings. Can you hear the clink of ice cubes in your tumbler as you recline in a retro chair? Great feeling, isnâ€™t it? The experience will leave you totally relaxed and ready to enjoy the luxury of your flight.

general: Children under 2 are admitted free with an adult.
Complimentary luggage storage available inside the lounge.

reviews.content: Small, few options of snacks, only paid meals.
This is an okay choice to relax with some European papers but food is limited and the lounge is small.
Limited hours make this next to useless. Closes at 130 most afternoons.
Open, quiet. Here at 7am with only a handful of people. Coffee, tea, light breakfast provided. Wine, beer and soda also available. Recommend.
Quiet atmosphere. Plentiful comfortable seating. Solid breakfast options. Nice staff. Priority Pass = no problems.
A little on the small side but used it via Priority Pass around 11am with no issues. Sandwich selection was solid!
Fantastic service, great food, especially the cod. Great seating for plane spotting.
Not very crowded on a Sunday afternoon. Self service cold sandwiches as well as beer and soft drinks. Very clean and bright.
Nice lounge will large selection of top shelf liquor. One of the only Priority Pass lounges I have seen with menu service vs buffet style food. Worth it if you meet the time window or have status.
Nice and clean at 7:30am. Pastries, cereal, sausage egg biscuits, coffee and juice in the morning. Not crowded. Champagne available. Good for the UA regional jet gets at A5 and below.
Little sandwiches and pasta salad at lunch, soft drinks, beer and wine.
Great service and even better martini!
Nice lounge, a bit small, but comfortable and with hot food cooked to order. Champagne and wines available and free.
This is a relaxing lounge with great and attentive staff. If you're close to the lounge windows, you can also see some pretty cool planes parked close-by, including the Saudia 777.
I love the signature style of the Virgin Atlantic Clubhouse. The burger on the menu is a personal favorite, and have it with champagne. Why not? An all round great lounge.

location.terminalDirections: After security, near the Air France boarding area, close to Gate 22.

otherLounges.name: Etihad Airways Lounge (Chase Sapphire Lounge by The Club)

location.terminalDirections: Concourse B, at the top of the escalators after arriving from AeroTrain

otherLounges.name: British Airways The Concorde Dining Room

location.terminalDirections: Near the Lufthansa Departure Gates B49-B51.
Near the Lufthansa Departure Gates B49-B51.
After Security, take the shuttle bus or train to Concourse C. Location is near Gate C14.
On the Arrivals (Baggage Claim) Level, across from Baggage Claim #11 and #12.
Located just past the main security checkpoint.
